page.title: 03Whalley Farm Whittington
page.content: The best job on the farm is combining the corn in the summer months.The worst job is digging post holes for fences.Mr.Roe has been living there for fifty years.The farm has changed a lot since he has been running it himself.It has become more productive.He owns 530 acres of land,the soil of which is typical for the area.300 is for growing corn and the rest is for grassland to feed and graze the milking cows.Mr.Roe has 280 cows and 150 of them are dairy cows. To help Mr.Roe on the farm,he owns various machines.He has 8 tractors which he uses to pull other machines around the farm.He also owns a combine harvester which harvests the corn in the summer months.Mr.Roe also owns a mower and a bailer.
